tr.td: Summer land surface temperature and the socioeconomic characteristics of households in the residential zones of the Netherlands in 2014
georeferenced datasets in the format of GIS polygon, GIS raster and SPSS with geographic reference.
The raw data is acquired from MODIS satellite imagery and the Statistical Bureau of the Netherlands. The data, subsequently, is analysed by use of Arc GIS Pro software.

Collection of satellite imagery data was according to three criteria: (1) provision of as many as possible satellite images from the summer of 2014, with roughly equal time intervals; (2) collection of as many as possible rasters cells which are not covered by cloud; (3) including as many as possible images.
The data is collected from public, open data sources and subsequently analysed.
